questions.question_text: What is the purpose of a Catalog Item variable?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
Answer: D. Allows the customer or consumer to qualify their answer

Explanation: D is the only one that makes sense... "Service Catalog provides several types of variables, which are also referred to as questions." 

source: https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/utah-servicenow-platform/page/product/service-catalog-management/concept/c_ServiceCatalogVariables.html ... but customer only answers the question not ask the question....

Selected Answer: D
D is the correct answer

Selected Answer: A
I think A. should be the right answer, based on the following

"Service Catalog provides several types of variables, which are also referred to as questions."

source: https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/utah-servicenow-platform/page/product/service-catalog-management/concept/c_ServiceCatalogVariables.html

comments.content: hmmm.. sorry i am wrong, in this case, D. is the correct answer, since customers don't create questions (a)......

choices.C: Guides a customer by providing hints on case forms
choices.D: Allows the customer or consumer to qualify their answer
choices.A: Grants the customer the opportunity to ask a question
choices.B: Opens a wizard to help a customer fill in a case form

questions.question_text: Advanced Work Assignment (AWA) automatically routes and assigns work items to agents based on which of the following rules? (Choose three.)
Which feature provides easy-to-configure integrations between the Now Platform and third-party Customer Relationship Management (CRM) and Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) tools or platforms?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D is the correct answer

Selected Answer: C
C is correct

Selected Answer: C
Customer (Accounts)
 

B2B Model

With the B2B model, both accounts and contacts can be supported. Customer relationships, especially primary contacts, and account teams must be set up to ensure the account can be managed and supported as formally agreed with the customer.

Account Data

The Account [customer_account] table stores the Accountâ€™s information, such as name, account number, primary contact, phone number, address, and company website address.

Account [customer_account] extends the Core Company [core_company]table in ServiceNow.
An account can have one or more associated cases, contacts, assets, service contracts, entitlements, relationships, etc.
Associated entities appear in related lists on the account form.

C is the right answer
Account [customer_account] extends the Core Company [core_company] table in ServiceNow
